content:
att.witnessed

provides attributes used to identify the witnesses supporting a particular reading in a critical apparatus. [12.1 The Apparatus Entry, Readings, and Witnesses]
Moduletextcrit â€” Critical Apparatus
Memberslem rdg
Attributes
@wit
contains a space-delimited list of one or more pointers indicating the witnesses which attest to a given reading.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.pointer
